analysis.description:
RubiixToken.decimals (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#770-771) shadows:
	- Lockable.decimals (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#466-467)
StandardLockableToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#621-626) is declared view but contains assembly code
empty in StandardLockableToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#700-701) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in StandardBurnableLockableToken.burn (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#749-750) is a local variable never initialiazed

empty in StandardLockableToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#635) is a local variable never initialiazed

StandardLockableToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#682-706) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,empty) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#702-703)

StandardLockableToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#654-675) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_chucks/3/0xc96f23a166c2cb107230a85371abf28c144aa793.sol#668-669)
